app_descript:
Brief: The Pregnancy Tracker by BabyCenter is an award-winning app designed to guide expectant parents through the journey of pregnancy and into the first year of their baby's life. With resources approved by the BabyCenter Medical Advisory Board, the app provides a wealth of information and interactive tools tailored to each stage of pregnancy and early parenthood.
